p:
According to previous bioinformatics analysis methods, principal component analysis, differential expression analysis of miRNAs, unsupervised hierarchical clustering, trend analysis, target prediction, gene ontology (GO) and pathway enrichment of differentially expressed miRNAs, and coexpression network analysis of key target genes were systematically conducted study utilizing the corresponding software
33 . The sequencing data were deposited in the National Center for Biotechnology Informationâ€™s Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) database ( www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/) and are accessible at series number GSE94551.
